Biblical Hebrew for linguists

Westminster Leningrad Codex

ʾāvā אָבָה ‘be willing’ (Hebrew)

Etymology: a primitive root (119) | Morphology: V

ʾāvā
1 1) to be willing, consent
1a) (Qal)
1a1) to be willing
1a2) to consent, yield to, accept
1a3) to desire
